pullRequest.title: Grazie migration: Added added_custom.txt and removed_custom.txt for taggers
pullRequest.bodyText: Added the ability to expand the tagger dictionary in forks without having to resolve merge conflicts (similar to spellchecker). Also moved default names and duplicated code to the BaseTagger.

commit.message: Add custom added.txt and removed.txt files for BaseTagger
Add possibility to request resources with same name to ResourceDataBroker

nodes.bodyText: Does this really work for more than two items in the for loop?
